name: Anetona
description:
Anetona is a 2D ARPG Platformer with puzzles, enemies and equipment.

In Anetona you play as Niel, a young swordsman who is out to fulfill his dying grandfather's wish to save the princess. As Niel, you must fight your way through several challenging levels, complete puzzles and battle an array of enemies and tough bosses. Will you help Niel rescue the princess or will you die hundreds of times trying and give up. Find out when you play Anetona.



-Features-

-Several Levels.
-A few resting points with a shop (If you can make it).
-Whimsical soundtrack.
-Multiple Skills to utilize.

*Disclaimer: This game is not made to be easy or for casuals and is an intended difficult experience.
